item.title: The Profane Temple of Demeter
item.description: These are my personal notes for an adventure.

item.title: NPCs
item.description: Giacomo Cafarelli Scribe and magic-user in Bruckstadt. Always looking for interesting magical items on behalf of the Der Hermetische Kristallbund. Jeka Garcia Mercenary leader and spirit medium.

item.title: Faction Developments
item.description: The Wolfguard frees Bruckstadt from the threat of the Saint, gaining the favor of Count Reuben. The Wolfguard claims Castle Aarhorst as their base, but Jeka Garcia and gets away and swears vengeance.

item.title: Domain rules
item.description: Rules: Every month, a domain turn happens (includes population changes, morale changes, tax collection, domain events, expansion). Expansion phase: Hire Scouts to explore adjacent hexes.
